alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 3:14AM EST until February 18 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River near Salyersville affecting Magoffin County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Licking River near Salyersville. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below the action stage of 14.0 feet this morning and recede to around 9.4 feet by around 7 PM EST this evening. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM EST.
